headline: LEYBOLD OERLIKON ROTARY VANE MECHANICAL VACUUM PUMP 20.9 CFM
description: Two Stage Rotary Vane Vacuum Pump      Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.   Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model D25B
Pumping Speed 20.9 CFM (590.6 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 1.50E-3(En) torr (2.00E-3 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Refurbished YES
Two-Stage YES
Direct Drive Yes
Motor Horsepower 1.5 HP
Rotational Speed 1,725 RPM
Oil Capacity Maximum: 0.47 L (0.50 qt, 0.10 Br gal)
Power Requirements 230/460 V 5.0 A 2.0 A(2) 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
